item.title: Re: Animeversus - Need a rival?
item.content:encoded:
Er… just to clarify:
Names are CASE SENSITIVE. For example: my name in animeversus and BVS is "moodragonx" and not "Moodragonx". I just realized that this may have caused some serious confusion at some point or another. Please make sure if you're adding me, to make sure the "m" is indeed lower-case.

item.title: Re: Animeversus - Need a rival?
item.content:encoded:
Not ALL, but most, of the information on the "How to Play" page for it is accurate, and that's good enough to get you started, ain't it? I walked into AV fairly confused after having read it all.

As I said that, parts were out of date: some of the rules changed, and I'm pretty sure they aren't doing a prize thing anymore. The unlocking Quests and stuff at level 35 is inaccurate as well.

On the other hand, the bonuses for certain numbers in each stat weren't wrong, which was nice.

( Sorry, but don't ask me for AV rivals…I'm full up until transmutation, and will then use Random forums for more rivals. And in late response to moodragonx saying that thread was a bit overwhelming, it's just there so the last page or page and a half of people, being recent posters assumed to be looking for rivals unless stated otherwise, can add and be added by people. Then, you just post which characters of yours added which characters off the thread. The worse that'll happen is that you added someone who was full up or forgot to check the thread, or you are added but forget to check back. Kinda like it's working here. )

item.title: Re: Animeversus - Need a rival?
item.content:encoded:
I (moodragonx) have graced Naito.

Also, cool stuff with the wiki. I couldn't find any help area online for animeversus when I started and was insanely confused but it's not hard to catch on and theres very little strategy/puzzling to it so besides initial confusion I wouldn't think there'd be much of a need for more clarification. But hey, I'm sure there'll be people who need the help. I'll see if I can input anything.

Also, people who have already posted:

CHeck back often. More likely than not more people will show up adding you as a rival and if you don't check you'll never know it. Just thought I'd get that out there.

item.title: Animeversus - Need a rival?
item.content:encoded:
Well, there's another game by animecubed that came before BvS called animeversus. It's not quite as deep as BvS and not as much fun (in my opinion) but it's not all that bad either. It's main drawing point for people who already play BvS us that after reaching a particular point in animeversus you get a special permanent item (See here:http://bvs.wikidot.com/items:pika-bike).

I was just wondering if anyone else played and more specifically if anyone that did play would be interested in adding me as a rival?

And if anyone's interested (and feeling generous) I'd appreciate it if you'd sign up (and give me a referral bonus after you reach lvl 10) by clicking here: http://www.animecubed.com/animeversus/av/create.html?friend=moodragonx

The referral bonus isn't all that great so I don't mind if you don't sign up under me, but I'm just looking to get some rivals.
The rival system in that game works a lot like the sparring system in Billy vs Snakeman but with more perks. The only problem is there's no in-game way of messaging someone so all the rival negotion has to be done somewhere outside of the game (which is why I'm here).

A lot of information about the game mechanics, and questions you may have about the game (as you start playing) can be answered here: http://www.animecubed.com/animeversus/howtoplay.shtml

Overall the game resembles BvS a lot (BvS is supposed to be a sequel) and isn't hard to pick up at all. It does parodies on manga and anime in general and their crazed fans (there's a fangirls stat).

So, if anyone's interested just post here we can exchange user names and start pummeling each other.
Thanks in advance.

P.S. Wrong Forum by any chance? I was debating between this and off-topic since this thread's purpose isn't necessarily to "discuss the game" but discussion isn't discouraged here so… don't shoot?

P.S.S. It takes quite a while to get the item in animeversus unless you get A LOT of rivals in the game and fight them daily. But the rival feature speeds things up when taken advantage of.
